keyword: how many calories in a shot of titos
title: How Many Calories in a Shot of Tito's?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a shot of Tito's vodka, including full nutrition breakdown, equivalents, and tweaks for mixers or portions.
h1: How Many Calories in a Shot of Tito's?
assumptions: Standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot of Tito's Handmade Vodka (40% ABV, 80 proof), straight, no mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact pour size, proof, and any added ingredients; alcohol content affects calorie count. Consult labels or apps for precision.

quick_answer.text: A standard shot of Tito's vodka contains about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mix with 1 oz regular tonic water

faqs.q: How many calories in a shot of Tito's vodka?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 calories for a 1.5 oz shot.

faqs.q: Does Tito's have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No, straight Tito's vodka has 0 g carbs, sugars, protein, or fat.

faqs.q: What affects calories in Tito's shots?
faqs.a: Pour size and proof; mixers like juice or soda add calories.

faqs.q: Is Tito's lower calorie than other vodkas?
faqs.a: Similar to most 80-proof vodkas at ~97 kcal per shot; varies slightly by brand.

faqs.q: Calories in Tito's vs. other spirits?
faqs.a: Comparable to gin or rum at 40% ABV; whiskey or tequila similar per shot.
